name: Mushroom balls
description: Mushroom balls are a tasty vegan appetiser, perfect for sharing
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup vegan butter (very soft or melted)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix everything in a bowl except the breadcrumbs, until the mixture becomes creamy.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix everything in a bowl except the breadcrumbs, until the mixture becomes creamy.

recipeInstructions.text: add bread crumbs to make it a bit stiff and make balls. I added some all purpose flour to dry the mixture more so its easier to make balls.
recipeInstructions.name: add bread crumbs to make it a bit stiff and make balls. I added some all purpose flour to dry the mixture more so its easier to make balls.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake balls on a baking sheet at 350 degrees F / 180ºc for about 20-25 minutes till the outer crust looks brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake balls on a baking sheet at 350 degrees F / 180ºc for about 20-25 minutes till the outer crust looks brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve warm with ranch or green chutney!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve warm with ranch or green chutney!
